home.subtitle2: I illustrate what others can/nbarely imagine.

about.title: About me
about.desc1: I'm a software developer; I enjoy building from the logic that holds everything together to the interfaces that connect with people. I like it when everything fits like a well-designed game with invisible mechanics. I blend logic and aesthetics to develop systems from start to finish, uniting structure, functionality, and visual experience.
about.desc2: Also, I'm a Leo, curious, expressive, and a bit stubborn (just the right amount). I run on iced coffee, pixel art, and playlists that change with every commit. If I’m not coding or sketching, I’m probably mid-game, mid-course, or mid-thought.

aboutStats.name: Laura D. Escobar Ruiz
aboutStats.quote: I craft software like puzzles./nEvery piece fits, every detail matters

portfolios.title: Portfolios
portfolios.softDesc: Software development and functional prototyping. Web, mobile apps, and backend logic for interactive systems and video games.
portfolios.visualDesc: Visual design and illustration. From character design to digital art.Concept art, diseño de personajes, escenarios y assets.
